column4: Its hard to teach people 'dont just install anything a web site pops up' :)   at least not without some 'incentives' like losseing the pc use for a few days while it reinstalls..
but, it says I get access to free porn.. :S
had a friend trash his windows box from a 'legit' web site that had him 'auto install a codec'  - wasent porn it was wrestling.. :)
lol nice. Unfortunately, I used to work in customer service - tech support - and a customer actually used that line on me.. :S
